title: Missing SkSurface::getTextureHandle
body:
For integrating Skia in a OpenGL application, i need the method `SkSurface::getTextureHandle`. Is there anyway to retrive the handle?

Documentation:
https://skia-doc.commondatastorage.googleapis.com/doxygen/doxygen/html/classSkSurface.html#af25af51b4df97c8eeb3782022edbe417

I also tried using `GL.GetInteger(GetPName.TextureBinding2D)`, but i'm not getting the correct texture of the rentertarget framebuffer attachment.

On the other hand, a (working) sample how to use `GRBackendTexture` would be a acceptable alternative. When calling `SKSurface.Create(...)` i always get a null object. Of course, i try give correct values (same colro space and so on), but i do not get any hints.

Is it possible to get error messages?
